recipes.creditText: Can't Stay out of the Kitchen
recipes.sourceName: Can't Stay out of the Kitchen

extendedIngredients.name: avocado
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ of an avocado, peeled, and thinly sliced

extendedIngredients.name: crusty bread
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 slices artisan bread like Italian, Sourdough, a hard-wheat bread or Crusty Bread

extendedIngredients.name: swiss cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 Swiss cheese slices, two of the slices cut in half

recipes.title: Grilled Swiss, Tomato and Avocado Sandwiches
recipes.instructions: Heat cast-iron skillet to low-medium heat.Add butter and melt.Spread two pieces of bread on a plate.Place a slice of Swiss cheese in the center of each piece of bread.Break remaining two cheese slices in half and place a half on each side of the bread overlapping the center piece of cheese.Add the sliced tomatoes overlapping each other and spread across one of the slices of bread with cheese.Add sliced avocado overtop of the tomatoes overlapping the edges.Sprinkle generously with salt and pepper.Place remaining piece of bread with cheese slices carefully over top.Place sandwich carefully in cast-iron skillet and cover with a glass lid.You will cook each side between 10-15 minutes over a low to medium heat.With a spatula, carefully turn sandwich over so remaining side can brown lightly.Cover with lid so cheese melts.Cook an additional 10-15 minutes until done.Remove sandwich with spatula to plate.Cut in half to serve.

steps.step: Heat cast-iron skillet to low-medium heat.
Spread two pieces of bread on a plate.
Place a slice of Swiss cheese in the center of each piece of bread.Break remaining two cheese slices in half and place a half on each side of the bread overlapping the center piece of cheese.
Add the sliced tomatoes overlapping each other and spread across one of the slices of bread with cheese.
Add sliced avocado overtop of the tomatoes overlapping the edges.Sprinkle generously with salt and pepper.
Place remaining piece of bread with cheese slices carefully over top.

Place sandwich carefully in cast-iron skillet and cover with a glass lid.You will cook each side between 10-15 minutes over a low to medium heat.With a spatula, carefully turn sandwich over so remaining side can brown lightly.Cover with lid so cheese melts.Cook an additional 10-15 minutes until done.
Remove sandwich with spatula to plate.
